text: The Azerbaijan men's national under-18 basketball team is a national basketball team of Azerbaijan, administered by the Azerbaijan Basketball Federation.Profile - Azerbaijan, FIBA.basketball It represents the country in men's international under-18 basketball competitions. ==Championship participations== *2007 FIBA Europe Under-18 Championship Division C – 8th place *2015 FIBA Europe Under-18 Championship Division C – 2nd place *2016 FIBA U18 European Championship Division C – 1st place *2017 FIBA U18 European Championship Division B – 22nd place *2018 FIBA U18 European Championship Division B – 20th place ==See also== *Azerbaijan national basketball team *Azerbaijan national under-16 basketball team ==References== ==External links== *Archived records of Azerbaijan team participations Category:Azerbaijan national basketball team Category:Basketball in Azerbaijan Category:National under-18 basketball teams Basketball
title: Azerbaijan men's national under-18 basketball team
